0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0100000101000000	SWAP R1, R2  	R1 = 0 , R0 = 1
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0100110001000100	ADD R4, R2, R1	R1 = 6
0101000100011100	IADD R1,10,R7	R7 = 16
0000000000101000	
0101101001110000	SUB  R2, R3, R4 	R4 = FFFFFFFFFF	
0110000101001100	AND  R1, R2, R3		R3 = 2
0110110001001100	OR  R4, R2, R3		R3 = FFFFFFFFFF
0111001100001100	SHL R3, 2	R1 = FFFFFFFFFC	
0000000000001000
0111101100001100	SHR R3, 1	R2 = 7FFFFFFFFFE
0000000000000100
